title: Nibs Juice Bar
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Juice bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Juice bar with a healthy concept offering sandwiches, salads, many kinds of juices and smoothies, desserts. Can replace some ingredients for vegetable milk and tofu - ask staff. Pet-friendly.
streetAddress: Rua Engenheiro Prudente Meireles de Morais, 305
